item.title: Woman Shoots, Kills Home Invasion Suspect in Trotwood - % stationx.name %] FOX 45 News :: News - Top Stories
item.description:
Woman Shoots, Kills Home Invasion Suspect in Trotwood - % stationx.name %] FOX 45 News :: News - Top Stories

TROTWOOD -- A home invasion suspect is dead after police say a mother fought back.Trotwood police say three males kicked in the back door of a home on Atlas Drive. They forced a woman who was doing laundry into a back room with two children. two other chi

item.title: 1 killed, 1 shot, 1 arrested at northwest Las Vegas home
item.description:
1 killed, 1 shot, 1 arrested at northwest Las Vegas home

Police said one teen was killed, another teen was shot and a third teen was arrested after a break-in at a northwest Las Vegas home Wednesday morning. The burglary and shooting happened about 11:15 a.m. at a home in the 1400 block of Daybreak Road, near the intersection of Jones Boulevard and Vegas Drive.
